tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE production_data (
  product_id INT,
  production_date DATE,
  quantity_produced INT,
  defect_count INT,
  process_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE production_data (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	product_name VARCHAR(255),
	production_date DATE,
	quantity INT,
	defects INT
)

CREATE TABLE employee_data (
	employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	employee_name VARCHAR(255),
	employee_department VARCHAR(255),
	employee_role VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE process_improvement (
	improvement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	improvement_date DATE,
	improvement_description TEXT,
	improvement_impact VARCHAR(255),
	improvement_cost DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE production_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  production_date DATE,
  production_quantity INT,
  production_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE defects_analysis (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  defective_product_name VARCHAR(255),
  defect_type VARCHAR(50),
  production_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE process_improvement (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  improvement_area VARCHAR(100),
  improvement_description TEXT,
  implementation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE employee_performance (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  performance_rating FLOAT,
  improvement_area VARCHAR(100),
  review_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE downtime_analysis (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  downtime_reason VARCHAR(100),
  downtime_duration TIME,
  production_date DATE
)
